GeoJSon object
The coordinate reference system for all GeoJSON coordinates is a geographic coordinate reference system, using the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS 84) datum, with longitude and latitude units of decimal degrees. This is equivalent to the coordinate reference system identified by the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) URN An OPTIONAL third-position element SHALL be the height in meters above or below the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid. In the absence of elevation values, applications sensitive to height or depth SHOULD interpret positions as being at local ground or sea level.

items.description:
A linear ring is a closed LineString with four or more positions.
The first and last positions are equivalent, and they MUST contain identical values; their representation SHOULD also be identical.
A linear ring is the boundary of a surface or the boundary of a hole in a surface.
A linear ring MUST follow the right-hand rule with respect to the area it bounds, i.e., exterior rings are counterclockwise, and holes are clockwise.

message.example: At least one field name and operator are required in format 'fields[:field_name][:operator]=:value

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Maximum number of Parcel Records to return.

countParam.name: return_count
countParam.description: Set to true to enable count of parcels in query.

returnCustom.name: return_custom
returnCustom.description: Default false: A true value allows county-specific fields to be passed through beyond standard schema fields only.

returnFieldLabels.name: return_field_labels
returnFieldLabels.description: Default false: A true value shows the naming convention for each standardized schema field.

returnStacked.name: return_stacked
returnStacked.description: Default true: A false value returns the first parcel if geometries are identical.

returnZoning.name: return_zoning
returnZoning.description: Set to false to disable zoning data in the response. Default is true when supported by the account.

matchedBuildings.name: return_matched_buildings
matchedBuildings.description: Set to false to disable building footprint data in the response. Default is true when supported by the account.

matchedAddresses.name: return_matched_addresses
matchedAddresses.description: Set to false to matched addresses data in the response. Default is true when supported by the account.

enhancedOwnership.name: return_enhanced_ownership
enhancedOwnership.description: Set to false to disable enhanced ownership data in the response. Default is true when supported by the account.

returnGeometry.name: return_geometry
returnGeometry.description: Default true. A features are returned without geometry values.

pathParam.name: path
pathParam.description: Represents the path for the /country/state/county. This restricts the search to this area.

canadaPathParam.name: path
canadaPathParam.description: Represents the path for the /admin0/admin1/admin2. This restricts the search to this area.

offsetId.name: offset_id
offsetId.description: ID from a previous query exceeding the limit, returns the next set of results up to limit.

radiusParam.name: radius
radiusParam.description: (Default: 0, Maximum: 32000) Radius in meters for which all Parcel records will be returned if they are within the radius zone from latitude and longitude point.

geojsonParam.name: geojson
geojsonParam.description: A GeoJSON object with at least one geometry to filter results. The geometries can be no larger than 80 sq miles. If both `geojson` and `lat`-`lon` are present, `geojson` takes precedence. Accepted GeoJSON formats are: FeatureCollection, Feature or geometry. Supported geometries: Polygon, MultiPolygon, Point, MultiPoint, LineString and MultiLineString. Variations of geometry types are allowed in a FeatureCollection.

queryParam.name: query
queryParam.description: A street address or partial address, starting at the beginning

canadaQueryParam.name: query
canadaQueryParam.description: A street address or partial address, starting at the beginning
canadaQueryParam.example: 500 CHASTELAINE ST, INCORPORATED COMMUNITY OF CROSS LAKE

confidenceScoreParam.name: confidence_score
confidenceScoreParam.description: Return parcels that matches the score or greater.
